Reviews.Title: Pretty cool watch
Reviews.Author: james michel
Reviews.Content: I decided to get a watch phone because I was always loosing my cell phone and I figure this was a way to keep my phone close at all times so first I want to address some of the complaints about this phone..One person says it is too big for a woman or a small man, well it is big but you can reduce the band size to fit a tiny wrist and that wasn't hard at all.Second someone said there is foil on the battery and I don't know what their point about that was but you are suppose to remove the foil where the dotted lines are, well I figured that out without even reading the instructions.Third there are complaints about the battery life, well if you take the time to read the instructions it clearly says do not charge the battery until it has run dead the first time and then charge it fully to get maximum charge, after that you can charge it anytime you wish.Now the instructions are there for everything you need to know but make sure you have a magnifying glass cause they are small and unless you have really good vision you will have a hard time reading them.One last thing that I want to comment on is the backing not fitting good, well as I was putting it together I noticed that the clasp was not bent out far enough to lock the back properly so all I did was bend the clasp as little further out and click into place it went and it is securely locked.All in all I really like this phone and if you are wanting a phone that you can always find then this is the best cell phone watch I have had so far and it works great so don't listen to the trivial complaints and if you wanna try it then try it cause you know if it sucks amazon does give full refunds so its a win win anyway you look at it.

Reviews.Title: EVERYTHING WORKS GREAT EXCEPT THAT BATTERY CASE DOESN'T CLOSE RIGHT!
Reviews.Author: Ronaldo Camargo
Reviews.Content: I DECIDED TO GIVE A TRY ON WATCH PHONES SO I BOUGHT AS MY FIRST EVERI TRIED AT&T;  AND T-MOBILE SIM CARDS AND IT WORKED FINEI ORIGINALLY GOT IT TO USE OVERSEAS SO I DON'T HAVE TO BRING UNLOCK PHONES ALL OVER THE PLACEAND MY RECENT TRIP TO SOUTH AMERICAI TRIED SEVERAL CARRIERSSUCH ASTIM- CLARO- VIVO FROM BRAZIL AND IT DID WORKED FLAWLESSLYNO COMPLAINTS AS FAR THE TOUCH SCREEN APS ETCONLY THING IS THAT YOU NEED TO USE THE LITTLE PENWHEN TEXTING ADDING CONTACTS NAMES OR BROWSING ON THE NETFOR MY FIRST WATCH PHONE I LOVE ITREASON WHY ISN'T 5 STARSFOR MEISDUE TO THE BATTERY COVER DOESN'T SHUT RIGHT FOR SOME REASONIF U DO A SUDDEN HARD MOVEMENT  YOU WILL FEEL THE COVER POPING OUTKIND OF ANNOYING ACTUALLYPLUS IT'S TO BULKY FOR MY TASTEAND HEAVYBUT IT DOES EVERYTHING ITS SUPPOSED TOO!!!IF YOU ARE A WOMAN ORSKINNY DUDETHIS PHONE ISN'T FOR YOU.

Reviews.Title: Best watch phone
Reviews.Author: Marcus
Reviews.Content: The best watch phone I've bought, The metal backing has to be closed properly and sometimes requires patients but i dont find myself needing to open the back all the time. Comes with internet browser, stylus and a bunch of apps. Better than alot of the other watch phones out there.

Reviews.Title: It is not expected
Reviews.Author: Ilonka Borisova
Reviews.Content: Not comfortable, low battery fast, the internet does not work, does not close properly watch top after putting the sim

Reviews.Title: Chinese junk
Reviews.Author: schulzinger
Reviews.Content: What a garbage have I purchased!!! I once had a cell phone watch. It was a decent toy, but the battery life was poor. This one looked great. but when it arrived, the battery looked suspicious. It was wrapped in the foil that had crackles and was coming off. When I plugged the phone to the charger, it sent me a message that it cannot charge because the there is an issue with the contact with charger. In asny case the phone is not working and I am looking for a ways no replaced it

Reviews.Title: Internet
Reviews.Author: Desruisseaux Andre Gerard Frantz
Reviews.Content: When I connect on the internet,  it takes long to upload. I don't experience an online search or browse with it yet.

Reviews.Content: How in the world do I  set this thing up helppp do I gotta  buy sims to go with them why is it 2sim slots
